20611.「全国３０００万のコロシアムファンの皆さま\n たいへん 長らく お待たせしまし:
To the 30 million Coliseum Fan Fans
nationwide, thank you for your patience!

20612.「ついに ついに 夢のビッグイベント\n 第１回バトリンピック決勝バトルの\n:
At long last, at long last, the curtain is
being raised on the big event of our dreams,
the 1st Annual Battlympics Final Battle!

20613.「バトリンピックは ラッカラン島オーナー\n ゴーレック氏を 大会名誉顧問として:
The Battlympics is an official Coliseum event
with Luckland Island owner Gorek as honorary
advisor.

20614.「さあ 記念すべき この決勝バトルの\n 第１試合で 戦うのは\n 予選第４位の:
Now, in the first match of this memorable
final battle, the fourth-place qualifier,
<pc>, will fight ...

20615.「対するは 予選第３位の バルケス選手です。\n ご観戦の皆さま 両選手に 盛大:
Against them is the third-place qualifier,
Valucas. Ladies and gentlemen, let's give a
big round of applause for both players!

20616.<if_woman>「よお ジェイコフの弟子のねーちゃん。\n オレのこと 覚え:
Hey there, Jakov's apprentice girl. Remember me? We met when I was collecting a debt, right? Yo, Jakov's disciple.
Remember me? We met when I was collecting a debt, right?

20617.「まさか ジェイコフの腰ぬけの弟子が\n 決勝バトルまで 残るなんてなぁ……。\:
I never thought Jakov's cowardly protege would
make it to the finals, but I'm lucky for me.

20618.「さっそく バトル開始と まいりましょう！\n 両選手とも 神妙に 見合って……:
Let's get this battle started right away! Both
players are looking at each other warily...

20620.「全国３０００万のコロシアムファンの皆さま\n たいへん 長らく お待たせしまし:
To the 30 million Coliseum Fan Fans
nationwide, thank you for your patience!

20621.「今回 戦うのは 奇しくも初戦と同じ\n この組み合わせ。\n 予選第４位の <:
This time, we will play <pc>, the
fourth-place finisher in the qualifying round.
The 4th place qualifier, <pc>, and...

20622.「予選第３位の バルケス選手です。\n ご観戦の皆さま 両選手に 盛大な拍手を！:
Here is Valucas, the third-place qualifier.
Ladies and gentlemen, give a big round of
applause for both players!

20623.「また お前と戦うのかよ？\n ……ったく うぜえ ルールだぜ！: You're gonna fight me again? Damn those rules!

20624.「さっそく バトル開始と まいりましょう！\n 両選手とも 神妙に 見合って……:
Let's get this battle started right away! Both
players are looking at each other warily...

20627.「さあ 予選４位が ３位をくだして\n 勝ち上がったのは <pc>選手！\n は:
The 4th place qualifier beat out the 3rd place
finisher, and the winner is <pc>!
Will he be able to overcome his rivals?

20628.「対するは 予選第２位の ブリギッテ選手。\n その優美な たたずまいからは 想:
Against him is Brigette, the second place finisher in the preliminary round. You would never guess from her graceful appearance that
she is a Coliseum fighter of great skill!

20629.「ご観戦の皆さま 両選手に 盛大な拍手を！:
Everybody, let's give a big round of applause
for both players.

20630.「あんた なかなか やるみたいね！\n でも コロシアム界隈じゃ ２番だわ。:
You're pretty good at that. But you're number
two in the Coliseum.

20631.「……１番は 誰なのかって？\n バカね。そんなの このブリギッテ様に\n 決ま:
Who's number one? You idiot. Of course it's
you, Brigette!

20632.「さっそく バトル開始と まいりましょう！\n 両選手とも 神妙に 見合って……:
Let's get this battle started right away! Both
players are looking at each other warily...

20635.「さあ 大変なことに なってまいりました！: Now, we have a big problem!

20636.「決勝が始まる前 誰が 予想できたでしょう？\n この無名の若者が これほどまで:
Before the finals began, who could have predicted that this unknown young man would be so strong? Who would have expected this
unknown young man to show such strength?

20637.「優勝に王手をかけた <pc>選手。\n 次も勝って 栄光を手にできるのか？\n:
is the winner of the championship. Will he win again and take the glory? Or will he lose again and go back to
being a fridgidashi?

20638.「立ちはだかるは コロシアムファンなら\n 誰もが知る 実力派バトルマスター。\:
Standing in his way is a battle master who is well known to all Coliseum War Fans. Sainz, the number one ranked player in the
preliminary rounds!

20639.「ご観戦の皆さま 両選手に 盛大な拍手を！:
Everybody, let's give a big round of applause
for both players.

20640.「まさか お前さんが ここまでやるとはな……\n はじめて会ったときは 想像もし:
I never imagined you would make it this far
when I first met you. As a senior, I am happy
to see your growth.

20641.「だが オレは オレこそが\n 最強のバトルマスターであることを\n 証明しなく:
But I have to prove that I am the best battle
master.

20642.「……特に ジェイコフの弟子である\n お前さんには 絶対 負けられないな。\n:
...Especially you, Jakov's disciple, I'll
never lose to you. No hard feelings!

20643.「それでは この運命の一戦\n バトル開始と まいりましょう！\n 両選手とも:
Let the battle of the fates begin! Both
competitors are looking at each other
warily...

20646.「第１回バトリンピック 優勝者……\n その名は <pc>だぁっ！！:
The winner of the first Battlympics...his name
is <pc>!

20647.「……それでは 大会名誉顧問ゴーレック氏より\n チャンピオン <pc>選手に\:
...and now Mr. Gorek, the tournament's honorary advisor, will present the champion with his prize and a bouquet of
flowers.

20648.「すばらしい バトルでありましたな。\n 自分は 心から感動したでありますよ！: It was a wonderful battle. I was truly moved!

20649.「た た 大変だぁぁぁっ！！\n リングに魔物が 入り込んでいるぞぉぉ！: Oh, my God! There's a monster in the ring!

20650.「<pc>っ！\n ゴーレックは オレが守る！\n お前は デンタザウルスを倒す:
<pc>! I will protect Golek! You must
defeat Tortoceratops!

20651.「……えー 運営側の報告によりますと\n 競技用に捕らえていた魔物が 搬送の途中:
Well, according to the report from the management, it seems that it was an accident that the monsters captured for the competition
escaped during the transportation.

20653.「この花束……これは 月光の花といって\n その香りは 今 倒した デンタザウル:
This bouquet... it's called the Moonlight
Flower, and its fragrance has the effect of
attracting the Tortoceratops we just defeated.

20654.「そして この花束を用意したのも\n コロシアムで使う魔物を管理してるのも\n:
And the same person who prepared this bouquet of flowers and the same person who manages the monsters used at the Coliseum... is that
really a coincidence?

20655.「そう。このバトリンピックを企画した張本人。\n コロシアムの裏メニューを取り仕:
Yes. The person who organized this Battlympics. Mr. Brandon, the Deputy Director who is in charge of Coliseum's Secret Menu.
It's you!

20656.「あなたは オーナーの地位を狙って\n ゴーレック氏を 事故に見せかけて暗殺すべ:
I believe that you have plotted the Battlympics to assassinate Mr. Gorek for his position as owner by making it look like an
accident!

20658.「逃がしはせんっ！: I won't let you get away!

20659.「計画は ついえたが……\n うちのボスを 捕らえさせるわけには\n いかねぇな:
The plan worked, but we can't let them get our
boss.

20660.「……セインズ。\n やはり ブランドンに ついていたか。: Sainz. I knew you were following Brandon.

20661.「アンタさえ 現れなきゃ\n すべて うまくいったものを……な。:
Everything would have been fine if only you
hadn't shown up.

20663.<center>騒然とした雰囲気の中 \n表彰式が 再開されることもなく\nバト:
The Battlympics came to a close without a
resumption of the awards ceremony amidst a
tumultuous atmosphere.

20664.「いやはや 大変なことになりましたなぁ。\n まさか バトリンピックが ブランド:
What a mess we've gotten ourselves into! I had
no idea that the Battlympics were the result
of a conspiracy by Mr. Brandon.

20665.「ンフフフ……。とはいえ 優勝は 優勝！\n あなたが 最強のバトルマスターであ:
But still, a winner is a winner! It is an
undeniable fact that you are the best battle
master.

20666.「表彰式で 渡しそびれていた優勝賞品は\n 今 ここで お渡ししましょう。:
The prizes that were not handed out at the
awards ceremony will be handed out now.

20668.「……と思いましたが どうやら 持ち物が\n いっぱいの ご様子。あずかっておき:
I thought so, but it seems that he has a lot
of things to take with him. Please come back
later to pick up your prizes.

20669.「セインズ選手や ブランドン氏の手下たちは\n 陰謀に加担していたとして\n あ:
It seems that Sainz and Brandon's crew have
been rounded up for their complicity in the
conspiracy.

20670.「よお <pc>。\n バトリンピック優勝 ご苦労だったな。\n おかげで いろ:
Hey <pc>. Thanks for winning the
Battlympics. Thanks for all the help.

20671.「まあ 聞きたいこともあるだろうが\n とりあえず 今回の修行も 達成したんだ。:
Well, I'm sure you have questions, but for
now, I've accomplished this training. I should
give you a reward.

20672.「……よし！ \n 今のオメーなら 使いこなせるだろう。\n バトマスの奥義を:
Okay! You're good now, you'll be able to use
it. I'm going to teach you the secrets of
battle master!

20673.「全身のチカラを 抜いておけよっ。\n ……いくぜ 必殺技のツボっ！！:
Keep your strength up. I'm going for the
special move, pot!

20674.「……え～っと それじゃ これ持ってけよ。\n まあ たいしたモンじゃねーけど。:
Well, take this with you then. Well, it's not
much.

20675.「……さてと 何から話したもんかなぁ。\n まずは オレと ゴーレックの関係か。:
Now...where should I start? First, my
relationship with Gorec.

20676.「ゴーレックとは 昔なじみの くされ縁でな。\n 昔っから 護衛とか 頼まれるこ:
Golek and I go way back. He's always asked me
to be his bodyguard, and this time I was
working at his request.

20677.「コロシアム副理事の ブランドンに\n 怪しい動きがあるから 調べてくれってさ。:
Brandon, the assistant director of the Coliseum, has been acting suspiciously, and he wants me to look into it. That old man is a
good judge of persons.

20678.「……で コロシアムに入りびたって\n 例のモンスター勝ち抜き戦に 出たり\n:
So I hung around the Coliseum, participated in
the Monster Contest, took out debts, and poked
around in various ways.

20679.「けど なかなか シッポがつかめなくてな。\n ようやく 何か大イベントを開いて:
But I couldn't seem to get a tail on it. I
finally figured out that they were going to
have some big event and make it happen there.

20680.「だが 無気力で なまけ者のオレが\n いきなり そんな大会に 出場したりしたら:
But if I, a lethargic, lazy monk, were to
suddenly enter such a tournament, it would be
extremely suspicious, wouldn't it?

20681.「それで 困ってたところに 現れたのが\n オメーだったわけさ。あんまり 都合よ:
I was in trouble, and you showed up. It was so
convenient that at first I thought Brandon was
setting me up.

20682.「あとは オメーにも 想像つくだろ？\n 仮面を着けたオレは オメーをおとりにし:
You can guess the rest, can't you? I was the
one in the mask, using you as bait to find out
what they were up to.

20683.「うまい具合に ブランドンは 月光の花集めに\n オメーを使ったりして おかげで:
Brandon was so good about using you to collect
the moonlight flowers, that I now know what
he's up to.

20684.「しかし まさか 元弟子のセインズが\n ブランドンの手下に 成りさがってるとは:
I had no idea that my former apprentice,
Sainz, was now Brandon's lackey. I was wrong
about that one.

20685.「……これで オレに話せることは 全部だ。\n 今まで 利用してきて すまなかっ:
That's all I have to say. I'm sorry I ever
took advantage of you. But it's also true that
I saw something shiny in you.

31960.「……はい？ 私ですか？\n 私は たまたま 受け付けをまかされていた\n 善良:
...Yes? Am I? I'm just a good Coliseum
employee who happens to be in charge of the
reception desk.

31961.「よく 見た目や 笑い方が 怪しいからって\n 何か企んでるんじゃ？……と疑われ:
People often suspect that I am up to something just because of my suspicious appearance and the way I smile. It's totally rude, isn't it?
That's very rude of them.

59308.「予想外の連続で いまだ 勝者は決せず。\n どうなる？ どうなってしまう！？\:
The winner has yet to be decided. What will
happen? What will happen? The 1st Battlympics
Final Battle!
